error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.

Parameter $entityQuery of method Drupal\sitecommander\Controller\SiteCommanderController::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated function file_default_scheme(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::config('system.file')->get('default_scheme') instead.
Call to deprecated constant UPDATE_CURRENT: Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\update\UpdateManagerInterface::CURRENT instead.
Call to deprecated function entity_load_multiple(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the entity type storage's loadMultiple() method.
Call to deprecated function entity_load_multiple(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the entity type storage's loadMultiple() method.
Call to deprecated function file_default_scheme(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::config('system.file')->get('default_scheme') instead.
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().

Parameter $entityQuery of method Drupal\sitecommander\Plugin\Block\SiteCommanderBlock::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated constant UPDATE_CURRENT: Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\update\UpdateManagerInterface::CURRENT instead.
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to sitecommander.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
